effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 763,675 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 311,386.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 77,124 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,158 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 188 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Transmogrified to:

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.
